Symbol.Script_3D:
! Bed Bunk
IF gs_shadow=0 THEN SHADOW OFF
Unid=1 !!! *** X Dimension HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID, A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0,0,unID, A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,0,unID, A,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,B,0,unID, A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,B,0,unID, A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,B,0,unID, A,2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Y Dimension HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID, B,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,-1,0,unID, B,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,B,0,unID, B,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A,0,0,unID, B,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,-1,0,unID, B,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,B,0,unID, B,2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Z Dimension HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID, ZZYZX,1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,0,-1,unID, ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,0,ZZYZX,unID, ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A,0,0,unID, ZZYZX,1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,-1,unID, ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,ZZYZX,unID, ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A,B,0,unID, ZZYZX,1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,B,-1,unID, ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,B,ZZYZX,unID, ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,B,0,unID, ZZYZX,1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,B,-1,unID, ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,B,ZZYZX,unID, ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
RESOL gs_resol pen gs_cont_pen material frmat if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_OFF then end ADD a/2,b,0
addy -0.01
mulx a/1.00 muly b/2.08 mulz zzyzx/1.5
add -0.50,-0.04,0 !!Legs Block 0.05,0.05,1.65 addy -2.03 Block 0.05,0.05,1.65 addx 0.95 Block 0.05,0.05,1.65 addy 0.40 Block 0.05,0.05,1.65 addy 1.63 Block 0.05,0.05,1.65 del 5 gosub 1000
add 0.45,-2.02,0.55 !!Ladder prism_ 5,0.05, 0,0,15, 0.05,0,15, 0.05,0.35,15, 0,0.35,15, 0,0,-1 addz 0.30 prism_ 5,0.05, 0,0,15, 0.05,0,15, 0.05,0.35,15, 0,0.35,15, 0,0,-1 addz 0.30 prism_ 5,0.05, 0,0,15, 0.05,0,15, 0.05,0.35,15, 0,0.35,15, 0,0,-1 del 3 gosub 2000
rotx 90 addz 0.03
prism_ 4,2.00, !!Frame -0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.30,15, -0.45,0.30,15
gosub 1000
material mmat
prism_ 6,2, 0.45,0.3,15, 0.45,0.375,79, 0.425,0.40,1079, -0.425,0.40,79, -0.45,0.375,1079, -0.45,0.3,15
gosub 2000
addy 1.10 material frmat
prism_ 4,2.00, -0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.30,15, -0.45,0.30,15
gosub 1000
material mmat
prism_ 6,2, 0.45,0.3,15, 0.45,0.375,79, 0.425,0.40,1079, -0.425,0.40,79, -0.45,0.375,1079, -0.45,0.3,15
gosub 2000
del 3
rotx 90 addz 2.03
material hbmat
prism_ 5,0.03, -0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.20,-1
addy 1.10 prism_ 5,0.03, -0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.20,-1 del 2
prism_ 5,0.03, -0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.20,-1 addy 1.10 prism_ 5,0.03, -0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.20,15, 0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.50,15, -0.45,0.20,-1 del 2
gosub 2000
if pw then rotz 90 rotx 90 add -0.48,0.40,-0.4
material pillow_mat
Prism_ 7,0.8, 0.40,0,15, 0.40,0.0434,79, 0.3438,0.0930,1079, 0.0438,0.0555,79, 0,0,1079, 0,0,15, 0.4,0,-1 addy 1.10 Prism_ 7,0.8, 0.40,0,15, 0.40,0.0434,79, 0.3438,0.0930,1079, 0.0438,0.0555,79, 0,0,1079, 0,0,15, 0.4,0,-1 del 4 endif
gosub 2000
del 5
end
1000: roty 90 gosub 5000 del 1 return
2000: gosub 5000 return
5000:
vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1
return
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Bed Bunk
CALL "Resize_A_B_ZZYZX" Parameters ALL
pen gs_cont_pen
call "fa_minimalspace" parameters all MSType = 2, diff2 = MSLengthAdd, diff3 = MSSide - MSSideAdd, unID = 3000
ADD2 a/2,b
mul2 a/1.00,b/2.08 hotspot2 0, -1.04 hotspot2 0, 0 line2 0.5, -2.03, 0.45, -2.03 line2 0.45, -2.03, 0.45, -1.68 line2 0.45, -1.68, 0.5, -1.68 line2 -0.5, 0, -0.5, -2.08 line2 -0.5, -2.08, 0.5, -2.08 line2 -0.5, 0, 0.5, 0 line2 0.5, 0, 0.5, -2.08 del 1
!!! ******************************** Different fills if bUniformFill then fillTypeBed = fillTypeUniform fillPenBed = fillPenUniform backPenBed = backPenUniform fillTypePillow = fillTypeUniform fillPenPillow = fillPenUniform backPenPillow = backPenUniform fillTypeBlanket = fillTypeUniform fillPenBlanket = fillPenUniform backPenBlanket = backPenUniform iContour = 1 else fillTypeBed = gs_fill_type fillPenBed = gs_fill_pen backPenBed = gs_back_pen iContour = 7+64 endif
fill fillTypeBed drawindex 10 poly2_b 5, 2+64,fillPenBed,backPenBed, -a/2,0,1, -a/2,-b,1, a/2,-b,1, a/2,0,1, -a/2,0,-1
del 1
IF iSymbolType = 3 THEN ! Type 3 LINE2 a, 0, 0, b endif
IF iSymbolType = 2 THEN ! Type 2 fill fillTypePillow drawindex 20 POLY2_B 5, iContour, fillPenPillow, backPenPillow, 0.06, b-0.48, 1, a-0.06, b-0.48, 1, a-0.06, b-0.06, 1, 0.06, b-0.06, 1, 0.06, b-0.48, -1 ENDIF
IF iSymbolType = 1 THEN ! Type 1 mm = 1 tempA = a a = 2 * a gosub 110 a = tempA ENDIF
END
!---------------->!!! RETURN !!!<----------------
110: fill fillTypePillow drawindex 20
POLY2_B 6, iContour, fillPenPillow, backPenPillow, mm*0.06, b-0.44, 1, mm*0.06, b-0.06, 1, mm*(a/2-0.06), b-0.06, 1, mm*(a/2-0.06), b-0.48, 1, mm*(a/2-0.17), b-0.48, 1, mm*(a/2-0.21), b-0.44, 1
drawindex 30 fill fillTypeBlanket
POLY2_B 6, iContour, fillPenBlanket, backPenBlanket, 0.03, 0.03, 1, a/2-0.03, 0.03, 1, a/2-0.03, b-0.62, 1, !a/2-0.21, b-0.62, 1, a/2-0.21, b-0.44, 1, 0.03, b-0.44, 1, 0.03, 0.03, -1 LINE2 a/2-0.03, b-0.62, a/2-0.21, b-0.62 LINE2 a/2-0.21, b-0.44, a/2-0.21, b-0.62 RETURN
Symbol.Script_VL:
hideparameter all "A", "B", "ZZYZX"
call "FM_types" parameters all
IF gs_cont_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=4 IF gs_fill_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
values{2} "gs_detlevel_3D_m" DLEV3D_OFF, `Откл.`, DLEV3D_DETAILED, `Детальный` VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [3,)
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_OFF THEN LOCK "gs_resol", "gs_shadow"
!!! ******************************** Minimal Space VALUES "MSSide" RANGE [0,)
!!! ******************************** Different fills if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "fillFor" then iFillFor = 1 for i = 1 to vardim1(stFillFor) if fillFor = stFillFor[i] then iFillFor = i next i parameters iFillFor = iFillFor else iFillFor = max(min(iFillFor,3),1) parameters fillFor = stFillFor[iFillFor] endif
if fillPenUniform=0 then parameters fillPenUniform=19 if fillPenPillow=0 then parameters fillPenPillow=19 if fillPenBlanket=0 then parameters fillPenBlanket=19
if iSymbolType = 1 or iSymbolType = 2 then if iSymbolType = 1 then values "fillFor" stFillFor values "iFillFor" 1, 2, 3 endif if iSymbolType = 2 then values "fillFor" stFillFor[1], stFillFor[2] values "iFillFor" 1, 2 hideparameter "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" lock "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" endif else values "fillFor" stFillFor[1] values "iFillFor" 1 lock "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" lock "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" endif
if bUniformFill then lock "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket", "gs_fill_type", "gs_fill_pen", "gs_back_pen" lock "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket", "gs_fill_type", "gs_fill_pen", "gs_back_pen" else hideparameter "fillTypeUniform", "fillPenUniform", "backPenUniform" lock "fillTypeUniform", "fillPenUniform", "backPenUniform" endif
! ----- 2D Symbol Type ----- values "styp" stSymbolTypes ! Type 1(1),Type 2(2),Type 3(3),Type 4(4) values "iSymbolType" 1, 2, 3, 4 if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "styp" then iSymbolType = 1 for i = 1 to vardim1(stSymbolTypes) if styp= stSymbolTypes[i] then iSymbolType = i next i parameters iSymbolType = iSymbolType else iSymbolType = max(min(iSymbolType,4),1) parameters styp= stSymbolTypes[iSymbolType] endif
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: gs_detlevel_3D_m DLEV3D_OFF = 0 DLEV3D_SIMPLE = 1 DLEV3D_DETAILED = 2 DLEV3D_DRAFT = 3
dim stSymbolTypes[4] stSymbolTypes[1] = `Тип 1` stSymbolTypes[2] = `Тип 2` stSymbolTypes[3] = `Тип 3` stSymbolTypes[4] = `Тип 4`
dim stFillFor[3] stFillFor[1] = `Кровать` stFillFor[2] = `Подушка` stFillFor[3] = `Одеяло`
Symbol.Script_UI:
dim stUIStings[] stUIStings[1] = `Параметры Кровати` stUIStings[2] = `Подушка`
! ====================================================================== ui_dialog stUIStings[1],444,266 ! Bed Settings
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
iPageIDRoot =-1 iPageID2DRep = 1 iPageID3DRep = 2 iPageIDMinimalSpace = 3 iPageIDDescriptions = 4
dim stTabTitles[4] stTabTitles[1] = `Подушки и 2D-отображение` stTabTitles[2] = `3D-отображение и Покрытия` stTabTitles[3] = `Минимальное Пространство` stTabTitles[4] = `Характеристики`
dim tabIcons[4] tabIcons[1] = "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" tabIcons[2] = "uiTab_3DRepr_flat(1)" tabIcons[3] = "uiTab_MinSpace_flat(1)" tabIcons[4] = "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)"
FILE_DEPENDENCE "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "uiTab_3DRepr_flat(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "uiTab_MinSpace_flat(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)"
pageStartY = 5
! ============================================================================== !UI_PAGES ! ==============================================================================
UI_PAGE iPageID2DRep, iPageIDRoot, stTabTitles[1], tabIcons[1] gosub "2DRepPage"
UI_PAGE iPageID3DRep, iPageIDRoot, stTabTitles[2], tabIcons[2] gosub "3DRepPage"
UI_PAGE iPageIDMinimalSpace, iPageIDRoot, stTabTitles[3], tabIcons[3] gosub "minimalSpacePage"
UI_PAGE iPageIDDescriptions, iPageIDRoot, stTabTitles[4], tabIcons[4] gosub "descriptionPage"
! ============================================================================== end ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== !Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "2DRepPage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
x1 = 0 x2 = 171 x3 = 261 x4 = x2 + 100 x5 = x2 + 200 !200 (Style Guide => fillTypeInfLenght) xEnd = 444
outfieldHeight = 15 infieldHeight = 19 penInfieldHeight = 25 penInfieldLenght = 33 fillTypeInfLenght = 200 fillTypeInfHeight = 25
pageStartY = 5 dy = 24 yEnd = 266 yCurrent = pageStartY + 1
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ui_infield{3} "pw", x1, yCurrent-2, x3 - 2 - x1, outfieldHeight, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, stUIStings[2], 0, 1, stUIStings[2], 1
yCurrent = yCurrent + 17
ui_separator 0, yCurrent, xEnd, yCurrent
pageStartY = yCurrent + 5
SYMBOLCLAS_BED = 2 call "ui_object_2DRepresentation" parameters all iSymbolClass = SYMBOLCLAS_BED, stSymbolTypes = stSymbolTypes, pageStartY = pageStartY, bUniformFill = bUniformFill, iFillFor = iFillFor, bShowDashedLine = 0, bShowSeatsIn2D = 0, bShowOpenSofaBed = 0, iFillListID = iPageID2DRep
return
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "3DRepPage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim surfacesArray[] surfacesArray[1] = "frmat" surfacesArray[2] = "hbmat" surfacesArray[3] = "mmat" if pw then surfacesArray[4] = "pillow_mat" endif
dim childFlagArray[] childFlagArray[1] = 0 childFlagArray[2] = 0 childFlagArray[3] = 0 if pw then childFlagArray[4] = 0 endif
call "ui_object_3DRepresentation" parameters all surfacesArray = surfacesArray, childFlagArray = childFlagArray, iSurfaceListID = iPageID3DRep return
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "minimalSpacePage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
call "fa_minimalspace" parameters MSType = 2 ! MINSPACE_SIMPLE_BED
return
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "descriptionPage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim stParamNames[16] stParamNames[1] = "gs_list_cost" stParamNames[2] = "gs_list_manufacturer" stParamNames[3] = "gs_list_note" stParamNames[4] = "gs_list_location" stParamNames[5] = "gs_list_accessories" stParamNames[6] = "FM_Type" stParamNames[7] = "FM_InventoryNumber" stParamNames[8] = "FM_SerialNumber" stParamNames[9] = "FM_ProductionYear" stParamNames[10] = "FM_ObjectWeight" stParamNames[11] = "FM_ObjectWeightUnit" stParamNames[12] = "gs_list_custom1" stParamNames[13] = "gs_list_custom2" stParamNames[14] = "gs_list_custom3" stParamNames[15] = "gs_list_custom4" stParamNames[16] = "gs_list_custom5"
call "ui_object_listing" parameters all listfieldID = iPageIDDescriptions, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", stParamNames = stParamNames return
